entry.name: slide
entry.title: Slide Effect
entry.desc: Slides the element out of the viewport.

option.name: direction
option.desc: The direction of the effect. Can be "left", "right", "up", "down".

option.name: distance
option.desc: The distance of the effect. Is set to either the height or width of the elemenet depending on the direction option. Can be set to any integer less than the width/height of the element.

option.name: mode
option.desc: The mode of the effect. Can be "show" or "hide"

example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the silver box.
